sourceOrganization.name: PEPFAR
sourceOrganization.description: PEPFAR is the U.S. government initiative to help save the lives of those living with and affected by HIV/AIDS around the world. This historic commitment is the largest by any nation to combat a single disease internationally, and PEPFAR investments also help alleviate suffering from other diseases across the global health spectrum. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/president-emergency-plan-aids-relief
alternateName: U.S. President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
